text: xāh̄rạb chāw chnbth kl̀āw ẁā reā ṣ̄rạthṭhā læ̂w cng kl̀āw t̄heid (muḥạmmạd ẁā) phwk th̀ān yạng midị̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā tæ̀ cng kl̀āw t̄heid ẁā reā k̄hêā rạb xis̄lām læ̂w pherāa kār ṣ̄rạthṭhā yạng midị̂ k̄hêā s̄ū̀ h̄ạwcı k̄hxng phwk th̀ān læa t̄ĥā phwk th̀ān cheụ̄̀xfạng pt̩ibạti tā mxạllxḥˌ læa rx sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ læ̂w phraxngkh̒ ca mị̀ thảh̄ı̂ kār ngān k̄hxng phwk th̀ān d̂xy lng tæ̀ prakār dı thæ̂ cring xạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng xp̣hạy p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
